title: TEGIAS Mens Slim Fit Stretch Jeans Classic Comfort Regular Fit
description: TEGIAS men's slim fit jeans. A classic pants style featuring five pockets, a zippered button fly and belt loops.
Jeans for men: Made with durable and comfortable stretch denim, it becomes a classic pair of jeans, a touch of color for everyday life.
Size Attention: This casual jeans is skinny design. Please refer to the accurate size chart. Pick up a larger size if you have muscular/strong leg or if you don't like skinny fit.
Excellent workmanship: Each pair of our men's slim fit stretch pants uses triple stitches, strong buttons and zippers.
Easy matching: This jeans is well on attending parties, working and casual at home. It fits well with business suit, formal dress or T-shirts.
